Album: X-Men: Days of Future Past (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
Lyric:
[by:大评论家]
[00:12.120]If I could save time in a bottle 
[00:17.200]The first thing that I'd like to do 
[00:22.360]Is to save every day till eternity passes away 
[00:29.200]Just to spend them with you 
[00:33.430]If I could make days last forever 
[00:38.410]If words could make wishes come true 
[00:44.030]I'd save every day like a treasure and then
[00:49.340]Again, I would spend them with you 
[00:54.250]But there never seems to be enough time 
[00:57.360]To do the things you want to do, once you find them 
[01:05.430]I've looked around enough to know 
[01:08.080]That you're the one I want to go through time with 
[01:28.040]If I had a box just for wishes
[01:33.290]And dreams that had never come true
[01:38.590]The box would be empty, except for the memory of how 
[01:45.020]They were answered by you 
[01:49.350]But there never seems to be enough time
[01:52.200]To do the things you want to do, once you find them 
[02:01.260]I've looked around enough to know
[02:03.780]That you're the one I want to go through time with
